name: Dungeon Faller - ScoreSpaceJam2022
description:
Fall through a dungeon, kill enemies, avoid hazards and last as long as you can. 

Move and avoid obstacles, use a lighting ray to destroy the hazards and enemies in your way, and take health potions to help you last a bit longer. How long will you fall and how high will your score be?

I only could build a windows version 'cause the web build gave me some problems. Sorry for the inconvenience

KNOWN ISSUES:

-health is not limited to 5, however health over 5 is not shown in health icons. 

------------------------Instructions------------------------

Move: A-D / Left and right arrows

Shoot Ray: Space bar

Land in enemies and hazards will reduce your health and make you lose points, hitting them with the ray will make you gain points and destroy them.

While you fall your score will increase, but if you land on a platform your score will slowly be reduced.
